Pre-Game Insights: The Houston Astros host the Kansas City Royals after Yordan Alvarez hit three home runs on Wednesday in a 10-0 win over the Phillies.
The matchup Thursday is the fourth time these teams match up this season.
Alvarez leads the Astros with a.311 batting average, and has 29 doubles, two triples, 28 home runs, 60 walks and 71 RBI.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Astros have a 59-18 record in games when they out-hit their opponents.
The Royals have the third-ranked team batting average in the AL at.258.
The matchup Thursday is the fourth time these teams match up this season.
Others: The Astros are 35-29 in home games and 71-62 overall.
The Royals are 34-31 on the road and 75-59 overall.
